experience.title: Customized Exhibit Designs
experience.Description: When you rent from us you are participating in the shared economy! Our goal is to reduce the amount of items that end up ultimately in landfills.

experience.title: Modular Frame System
experience.Description: When our items are too worn out to rent, we will extend their lifecycles by donating them, or reusing the fabrics to make new items.

experience.title: Rental Exhibit Options
experience.Description: It is more sustainable to rent items you would otherwise use only a couple of times. The more we can share, the less waste we create.

experience.title: Graphics and Storage
experience.Description: Whether you want to elevate the everyday meal or plan an elegant dinner party, we are here to deliver lots of style with little fuss.
